## Type of Change

<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] `feat` - New feature
- [ ] `fix` - Bug fix
- [ ] `refactor` - Code restructure (no functional change)
- [ ] `docs` - Documentation only
- [ ] `test` - Tests only
- [ ] `chore` - Dependencies, configs, etc.
- [ ] `a11y` - Accessibility improvement

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project patterns (see `docs/DEVELOPMENT.md`)
- [ ] TypeScript has no errors (`npm run type-check`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] No `console.log` statements left in code
- [ ] No `any` types without justification comments

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated for new code
- [ ] All unit tests pass (`npm run test`)
- [ ] E2E tests added/updated (if user-facing)
- [ ] All E2E tests pass (`npm run test:e2e`)
- [ ] Coverage meets targets (80%+ for new code)

### Accessibility
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] ARIA labels on interactive elements
- [ ] `data-testid` attributes on testable elements
- [ ] Screen reader tested (if significant UI change)

### Responsive
- [ ] Works on mobile (375px)
- [ ] Works on tablet (768px)
- [ ] Works on desktop (1920px)

### Documentation
- [ ] Code is self-documenting or has comments where needed
- [ ] Types are properly documented with JSDoc (if complex)
- [ ] PRD updated (if feature change)
- [ ] README updated (if setup change)
